About the Company: Praveg Communications (India) Limited is reckoned among the leading Exhibition & Event Management Companies of India, having successfully managed more than 500 national & international exhibitions during the last 16 years. With an in-house modern design studio, a team of qualified & experienced professionals and sophisticated event infrastructure, Praveg can execute and manage the most challenging of assignments.
